```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
```


# Data loading

```{r}
cache_data <- read_csv("./cache-log.jtl")
normal_data <- read_csv("./normal-log.jtl")
```

# Viewing data

```{r}
ggplot(cache_data) + 
  geom_bar(aes(x = responseCode), fill = c("dodgerblue")) + 
  labs(
    title = "Response codes", 
    x = "Number of response code", 
    y = "Count"
  )
```


```{r}
ggplot(cache_data, aes(y = Latency)) +
  geom_boxplot()

ggplot(normal_data, aes(y = Latency)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```


```{r}
ggplot(cache_data, aes(x = Latency, y = elapsed)) + 
  geom_point()

ggplot(normal_data, aes(x = Latency, y = elapsed)) + 
  geom_point()
```
